topic.title: Two Horizons
topic.body:
Hello @blurhy @all, i see there are two Horizons in my sites list:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CjMsvhJ2JsV4B5qo3FDHnF3mvRCcHuxBn/
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HoRiznsHbJAqs2bmrVcSd79NTGVFp4Ju2/
Which version is updated? Can the outdated by redirected to new one? So the people who do not read this topic do not use wrong version by mistake?
